attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Using this app for just a few minutes sent me into the most aggressive fit of diarrhea in the history of mankind. Science, please explain.

attributes.title: Nightmare fuel🤮😱
attributes.review: The second I opened the app I saw an image that will haunt my dreams. I’m not exactly sure what it was, but it looked like a Cheeto with a face and some weird yellow fluff on its head. Horrifying.

attributes.title: This app ... no ❤️
attributes.review: This app is very bad ! As soon as I opened it I saw something disgusting! Terrifying! What looked like a roten orange  ✨💞🧚🏽 he should go on a cruise he deserves it 🧚🏽😍✨ just make sure it’s the titanic ✨🌳

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: took forever to download and wouldn’t work half of the time. it also had malicious content and lots of hate speech within the app. over it was a horrible app and would not recommend it to anyone. i would give it a zero star rating if i could
